embed.description: That's what I did, it is with a view to a better future in our shared game, I play a lot, and track up to date news from the world of League of Legends, and my wish is a new model for the Taric, I ...

replies.body: And yet it will never get into the game.
I wish they turned taric into a fighter or this, either way when i see this, i see WOW THATS TARIC but at the same time, its updated and looks nice. Thumbs up on the work.

That is a really cool player concept, I thought it was official upon first glance!
I think Riot will get to Taric sooner or later; he is one of the few remaining champions that retains his pizza feet.
This actually looks really good, holy %%%%
